Title: The Buddy System
Description:
Oh, hello there. Was I speaking my thoughts out loud again?

I don't mean to trouble others with my problems, but...

I'm a sniffenseeker, you see. We find unique and amazing places all over the cavern! But we have an important rule here in Loamm--we always follow the buddy system. Nobody digs alone!

I've had the same buddy since we were pups, but she's too busy to dig anymore. I found this interesting new smell. Before, I had a buddy...

Say, how do you feel about being a stand-in dig partner?
ObjectivesText: Go on a dig adventure with Myrrit.

Objectives.Text: Go on a Dig with Myrrit
